price: Ngoja tu, na wao wangoje pia.
footnotes: Basi wewe yangojee hayo yatakayo wafika, na wao pia wanangojea yatakayo kufika wewe na huo wito wako, mambo yakibadilika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
